name: Melvin's Resurrection
description:
Game done by all by meself for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2.

It was a grueling but incredibly fun week, and I have gain immeasurable amount of technical knowledge, and learned from all the mistakes I've made during the dev-week.

Reality also hit me like a 200 ton truck - I have ALOT to learn and practice.

First game made solely by myself, but please leave a comment on your thoughts (constructive, complimentary, and complaint comments are all welcomed!).
